description: This Open House Festival, biophilia-inspired development Wardian London is opening the doors to its breathtaking 53rd floor sky lounge: The Observatory.

factsheet.heading: About this event
paragraphs: This Open House Festival, biophilia-inspired development Wardian London is opening the doors to its breathtaking 53rd floor sky lounge: The Observatory.

Creating a serene oasis above the hustle and bustle of Canary Wharf below, with botanically-inspired interiors and breathtaking views of the London skyline, the Observatory is one of the most special venues in London.

Book a ticket to access the Observatory and enjoy panoramic views of the city. There will also be a light soft drink reception, and opportunity to network with Will Poole, partner and architect at Howells, to find out more about the inspirations behind the design of Wardian and the importance of incorporating nature into our living spaces.

images.title: Wardian London: The Observatory sky lounge

travel_info: Additional travel info: Wardian London is a short walk from Canary Wharf (accessible by Jubilee Line, DLR and Elizabeth Line).

name: Wardian London: The Observatory
